title: Disk Space and Storage Issues
description: Fix low disk space and storage problems.

steps.title: Check Disk Space
steps.instruction: Windows: This PC → Right-click C: drive → Properties. Mac: Apple menu → About This Mac → Storage.

steps.title: Run Disk Cleanup
steps.instruction: Windows: Search 'Disk Cleanup' → Select C: drive → Check all boxes → OK. This removes temporary files.

steps.title: Empty Recycle Bin/Trash
steps.instruction: Right-click Recycle Bin (Windows) or Trash (Mac) → Empty to permanently delete files.

steps.title: Uninstall Unused Programs
steps.instruction: Windows: Settings → Apps → Apps & Features → Uninstall unused software. Mac: Drag apps to Trash from Applications folder.

steps.title: Move Files to External Drive
steps.instruction: Move large files (videos, photos, old documents) to an external hard drive or cloud storage.
